P(trueU[<=t]a4) = ?
Step for t is 300.

l = 1/12.4 ( = 5/62 = 0,080645161290322580645161290322581 ), t in [0,..,2400]

1) p = 0,99 ( = 99/100 ),  (1-p) = 0,01 ( = 1/100 )
   q = 0,43 ( = 43/100 ),  (1-q) = 0,57 ( = 57/100 )

2) p = 0,5 ( = 1/2 ),      (1-p) = 0,5 ( = 1/2 )
   q = 0,5 ( = 1/2 ),      (1-q) = 0,5 ( = 1/2 )

Plot curves.

Transitions for CTMC A and B (each has 4 states):

---A---                            1)                                              2)

1 1 2*p*l            =            99/62   = 1,5967741935483870967741935483871      5/62  = 0,080645161290322580645161290322581
1 2 2*l*(1-p)        =             1/620  = 0,0016129032258064516129032258064516   5/62  = 0,080645161290322580645161290322581
2 1 l*(1-q)          =            57/1240 = 0,045967741935483870967741935483871    5/124 = 0,04032258064516129032258064516129
2 2 l*p              =            99/124  = 0,79838709677419354838709677419355     5/124 = 0,04032258064516129032258064516129
2 3 l*(1-p)          =             1/1240 = 8,0645161290322580645161290322581e-4   5/124 = 0,04032258064516129032258064516129
2 4 l*q              =            43/1240 = 0,03467741935483870967741935483871     5/124 = 0,04032258064516129032258064516129
3 2 2*l*(1-q)        =            57/620  = 0,091935483870967741935483870967742    5/62  = 0,080645161290322580645161290322581
3 4 2*l*q            =            43/620  = 0,069354838709677419354838709677419    5/62  = 0,080645161290322580645161290322581

---B---                            1)                                               2)

1 1 l*p^2            =          9801/124000 = 0,079040322580645161290322580645161  5/248 = 0,020161290322580645161290322580645

3 4 (q^2+2q(1-q))*l  =          6751/124000 = 0,054443548387096774193548387096774 15/248 = 0,060483870967741935483870967741935
